text: Kintu na, tomara khodara kasama! Tara imana ane na ye paryanta na tara tomake bicaraka manonita kare se'i bisaye yate tara parasparera madhye matabirodha kare, tarapara nijedera antare kono birupata paya na tumi ya mimansa karo se-sanbandhe, ara tara aâ€Œtmasamarpana kare purna samarpanera sathe.
